response.overview: Justin and Sandhiya, determined to be together despite opposition, elope with the help of their friends, Kirthi and Vijay. Vijay arranges a secret register marriage, but until then, the couple hides in a deep forest. In the wilderness, they find themselves caught in a dangerous situation, facing unforeseen trouble. With their lives at risk, their love and the support of their friends become their only hope for survival.
response.title: Nenju Porukkuthillaiye
